data.name: Truck Driver - UK Paint Jobs DLC
data.detailed_description:
About UK Paint Jobs DLC

Whether it’s the London skyline, the Barbary Lion or the Big Ben, with this pack you can drive around Truck Driver with British pride. All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

  • British flag 
  • Barbary Lion 
  • London skyline 
  • Norman Gate 
  • Big Ben 
  • Stonehenge
data.about_the_game:
About UK Paint Jobs DLC

Whether it’s the London skyline, the Barbary Lion or the Big Ben, with this pack you can drive around Truck Driver with British pride. All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

  • British flag 
  • Barbary Lion 
  • London skyline 
  • Norman Gate 
  • Big Ben 
  • Stonehenge
data.short_description: “Fancy a British lorry?” With six different paint jobs, you can customize your truck with classic British designs. Create a truck that perfectly reflects your love for the United Kingdom with paint jobs of typical British symbols.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2,6Ghz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4th Gen / AMD A10 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
